paragraphs: I hope you can understand—Darius is just so handsome and kind! He's not like the other Sphinxmoth Bandits. He just wants to save up enough to buy a farm for the two of us. Please understand why I had to go with him.
And please, I beg you, father—don't try to follow us. These are dangerous people and I don't want you to get hurt.
P.S. I'm sorry about taking mother's ring, but Darius didn't have enough money to buy an engagement ring.
